title: Manage a Lease Renewal
description: A tenant's lease is expiring soon. The property manager must manage the renewal process.

tasks.description: Identify that a tenant's lease is expiring in 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is alerted by the CRM about the upcoming lease expiration.

tasks.description: Send a lease renewal offer to the tenant, including any proposed rent increase.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal renewal offer is sent to the tenant.

tasks.description: If the tenant accepts, generate the new lease agreement and send it for signature. If they decline, begin the move-out process.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lease is renewed or the move-out process is initiated.
